tasks.title: Align docs with branch-local tasks and INTEGRATOR workflow
tasks.description: Update repository docs to reflect branch-local task files (tasks-<branch>.json), DONE-only tasks.json on main, and the INTEGRATOR agent role in post-merge task integration.

comments.author: docs
comments.body: Updated README, GUIDELINE, and CONTRIBUTING to reflect branch-local task files and INTEGRATOR integration.
